name: endocrinal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to hormones (= chemicals made by living cells that influence the body's development, growth, sex, etc.) or to any of the organs in the body that make them and put them into the blood: Many processes in the body are controlled by the endocrinal system. Age-associated endocrinal changes are actually similar in cattle and in humans. Synonym
endocrine
More examplesFewer examplesEndocrinal causes of obesity such as diabetes mellitus and hypothyroidism were excluded.Cushing's syndrome is an endocrinal disorder characterized by elevation of glucocorticoid levels. The atrophy of one of the endocrinal glands upsets the development of the others.Congenital adrenal hyperplasia is an endocrinal disease. There may be delayed puberty due to endocrinal disturbances.
